name: Sprite Town
description:
This is a beautiful and mysterious land, where all kinds of strange Sprites live. Every Sprite trainer with a dream will collect his dream Sprites through the exploration of this continent, and grow up with them and fight side by side!

[Game features]
Explore the vast and wonderful continent
In this vast continent, every piece of land is worth exploring. You will encounter many powerful Sprites. you can experience the epic storyline, and win rich rewards

Find the best combination to build your team
Sprites with different powers that have lots of combinations. Build your elite team. Find the best combination to maximize their synergies and their potential.

Upgrade and evolve your Sprites
Level up to higher your Sprites grade, star up to make them more powerful, awake your Sprites to get different looks and skills. Tons of ways to evolve your Sprites. Become the ultimate trainer.

Challenge the epic arena
The ancient battlefield is full of dangers, and treasures. Trainers camp, and find their partners to fight together . Here you can make friends or meet the most dangerous enemies. Glory awaits. Who can win the ultimate challenge.

Wonderful guild system
You can build a guild with your friends, or you can join your favorite guild. Make friends there and fight as a team. Fight for glory.
